Package aima.core.environment.nqueens

Class Summary
AttackingPairsHeuristic Estimates the distance to goal by the number of attacking pairs of queens on the board.
NQueensBoard Represents a quadratic board with a matrix of squares on which queens can be placed (only one per square) and moved.
NQueensFitnessFunction A class whose purpose is to evaluate the fitness of NQueen individuals and to provide utility methods for translating between an NQueensBoard representation and the String representation used by the GeneticAlgorithm.
NQueensFunctionFactory Provides useful functions for two versions of the n-queens problem.
NQueensGoalTest  
QueenAction Queens can be placed, removed, and moved.
